results.description: Celtic captain Scott Brown says the draw against Rennes in France could prove "huge" in their Europa League Group E campaign.
results.shortTitle: 'Point could be huge in the group' - Brown
results.title: Celtic: 'Point in Rennes could prove huge in group' - Scott Brown

results.description: Ryan Christie's second-half penalty earns Celtic a draw in Rennes in their opening Group E match in the Europa League.
results.shortTitle: Christie earns Celtic point in Rennes
results.title: Rennes 1-1 Celtic: Christie's penalty earns visitors Europa League point

results.description: Wonderkid Eduardo Camavinga and £19m new recruit Raphinha are among the main dangers facing Celtic in their Europa League meeting with Rennes.

results.description: What do you know of the French connections as Celtic prepare to face Rennes in Europa League Group E?

results.description: Former Swansea City duo Luciano Narsingh and Leroy Fer find scoring form as Feyenoord prepare for Rangers, while Rennes are held ahead of Celtic tie.

results.description: French champions Paris St-Germain fall to a surprise defeat as they throw away a goal lead and are beaten by Rennes.
results.shortTitle: Rennes fight back to beat PSG
results.title: Rennes 2-1 Paris St-Germain: Ligue 1 champions PSG suffer shock defeat

results.description: Watford complete the club record signing of Senegal winger Ismaila Sarr from Rennes.
results.shortTitle: Watford sign Sarr in club record deal
results.title: Ismaila Sarr: Watford sign Senegal winger from Rennes for club record fee

results.description: Senegal goalkeeper Edouard Mendy is ready for a new adventure at French Ligue 1 club Rennes after joining from rivals Reims.
results.shortTitle: Senegal's Mendy set for Rennes adventure
results.title: Edouard Mendy: Senegal goalkeeper ready for Rennes adventure

results.description: Paris St-Germain fight back from a goal behind to beat Rennes 2-1 in the Trophee des Champions in China.
results.shortTitle: PSG seal Trophee des Champions victory
results.title: PSG beat Rennes to win Trophee des Champions in China

results.description: French side Rennes activate a buyout clause to sign Senegal's M'Baye Niang on a permanent deal from Italy's Torino.

results.description: Rennes stun Paris St-Germain on penalties to win their first French Cup since 1971.

results.title: Barcelona v Levante plus Inter Milan v Juventus & Rennes v PSG updates

results.description: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang inspires an Arsenal victory over Rennes as they progress to the quarter-finals of the Europa League.
results.title: Arsenal 3-0 Rennes (agg: 4-3): Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang inspires Europa League comeback

results.description: Ten-man Arsenal suffer their first away defeat by a French club in European competition in the first leg of their Europa League last-16 tie at Rennes.
results.title: Rennes 3-1 Arsenal: Ten-man Gunners slip to Europa League defeat

results.shortTitle: Europa League - Chelsea put one foot in last eight with convincing home win

results.description: Some Arsenal fans are unhappy because the side's Europa League first leg against Rennes was switched about one hour after the draw.

results.description: Paris St-Germain maintain their unbeaten start to the season with a comfortable victory over Rennes.

results.description: Monaco reach the French League Cup semi-finals with a marathon penalty shootout win over Rennes that sees keeper Loic Badiashile score the winner.

results.description: Former Stoke City forward Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting scores his first Paris St-Germain goal as they win at Rennes.
